tutorials.title: Localization Workflow
tutorials.description: Translate your visual novel into multiple languages. Export, translate, and import text efficiently.
tutorials.author: NovelMind Team

steps.title: Localization Panel
steps.content: The Localization panel manages all translatable text in your project. Add languages and manage translations here.

steps.title: Add Languages
steps.content: Click 'Add Language' to add a new translation target. Each language maintains its own set of translations.

steps.title: String Table
steps.content: The table shows all strings with their translations. Empty cells indicate missing translations.

steps.title: Editing Translations
steps.content: Double-click any cell to edit the translation directly. Changes are saved automatically.

steps.title: Export for Translators
steps.content: Export to CSV, PO, or XLIFF formats for professional translators. They can work in their preferred tools.

steps.title: Import Translations
steps.content: Import completed translation files. The system matches strings by ID and updates translations.

steps.title: Preview Languages
steps.content: Switch the preview language in Play-In-Editor to test how your game looks in each language.

hints.content: Some strings are missing translations. Export to send to translators.
